data.explanation: A conjunction joins words or groups of words.
options: A word used to join words or groups of words

easy.question: What is a conjunction?

data.statement: The dog and the cat are in the garden.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows choice?

data.statement: Is this my pencil or yours?

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows contrast?

data.statement: He is poor but honest.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction gives reason?

data.statement: I trust him because he is honest.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction joins actions?

data.statement: The boys came running and shouting.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction means 'if not'?

data.statement: The dinner will be cold unless you walk home fast.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows result?

data.statement: It rained, so I took a carriage.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows time?

data.statement: The mice will play when the cat is away.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows condition?

data.statement: You will get the prize if you work hard.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction means 'even though'?

data.statement: I missed the train although I walked fast.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction adds information?

data.statement: You and I must go.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows effect?

data.statement: The bag was heavy, so I could not carry it.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction introduces reason?

data.statement: We shall not go out as it is very hot.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction joins two equal ideas?

data.statement: Two and two make four.

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows alternative?

data.statement: Is that story true or false?

easy.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.

data.explanation: 'Although' shows contrast where one fact does not change the result.

hard.question: Which conjunction shows contrast despite effort?

data.statement: He failed in the exams though he worked hard.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.

data.explanation: 'So' shows the result of an action.

hard.question: Which conjunction shows result after a condition?

data.statement: He worked hard, so he passed the exams.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction expresses a condition that must be met?

data.statement: Unless you write it down, you will forget it.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction introduces time before another action?

data.statement: We arrived before the storm came on.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows two actions happening together?

data.statement: While I was going down the street, I met him.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction introduces an unexpected result?

data.statement: I ran fast, but I missed the train.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction introduces reason subtly (not directly)?

data.statement: We shall not go out as it is very hot.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction introduces uncertainty between options?

data.statement: I do not know whether he will join us.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction links actions until a time limit?

data.statement: They worked until it was quite dark.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows a result caused by weight or reason?

data.statement: The bag was heavy, so I could not carry it.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction expresses contrast similar to 'but' but stronger?

data.statement: He is very rich, yet he is not happy.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows choice between two alternatives?

data.statement: Do you know whether the letter has been posted or not?

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows cause followed immediately by action?

data.statement: Radha got burnt because she was careless.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction joins two clauses of equal importance?

data.statement: I cleaned the board and he wrote on it.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction introduces concession despite fact?

data.statement: Though poor, he never works hard.

hard.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.

medium.question: Which conjunction shows contrast between two clauses?

data.statement: I ran fast, but I missed the train.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction gives a reason?

data.statement: Rama failed in the exams because he was ill.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows result or effect?

data.statement: The bag was heavy, so I could not carry it.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction introduces a condition?

data.statement: If he comes, I shall stay.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction means 'if not'?

data.statement: Do not answer unless you are asked.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows time?

data.statement: While I was going down the street, I met him.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows contrast like 'but'?

data.statement: He is very rich, yet he is not happy.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction joins two clauses of time order?

data.statement: I ran away before he could catch me.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows concession?

data.statement: He bowled well, although he was tired.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction is used to join two alternatives?

data.statement: Is that story true or false?

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction gives reason similar to 'because'?

data.statement: I stumbled as I was going downstairs.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction shows sequence until an action ends?

data.statement: They worked until it was quite dark.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction introduces reported uncertainty?

data.statement: I do not know whether he will join us.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction is used to show cause and result?

data.statement: It rained, so I took a carriage.

medium.question: Select the conjunction from the sentence.
Which conjunction connects two actions happening together?

data.statement: She sang and she went along.
